[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[=]]
[[size 1.5em]][[[https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-2847|夏后禹]]]
[[/size]]

**//“他的仆从凋零死去，只有他…他现在是真正不死了。”//**

by [[*user SunnyClockwork]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/cqh/%E7%A7%A6%E5%A7%8B%E7%9A%87]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[=]]
[[size 1.5em]][[[https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/we-want-to-be-immortal|秦始皇嬴政]]][[/size]]

**//“你不再是大秦的皇帝了！”//**

**//“你是阿房！是罪囚贰陆叁！”//**

by [[*user Confucian Lee]]

[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[/size]]

**//“帝王要成那玉龙相，桌上酒席落成落。”//**

by [[*user cqhsama]]
